1. One window in the pig enclosure was broken, and broken jagged glass was observed directly above the animals. This
could potentially cause injury to the pigs if the glass were to fall into the enclosure. Facilities must be maintained in good
repair in order to prevent injury to the animals. The facility must correct this issue.
2. Bailing twine was observed wrapped around the fencing for an enclosure housing sheep, goats and alpacas. This could
cause injury to the animals if they were to become entangled in the twine or if the the twine was ingested. Facilities must
be maintained in good repair in order to prevent injury to the animals. The facility must correct this issue.
